dict.acceptation: 农场，农庄；农家；畜牧场；农田；
耕种；养殖；承包，包出；佃出（土地）；

sent.orig: Maintenance of our farm and farm facilities.
sent.trans: 维护农场设施和农场面貌。

sent.orig: It is very import to establish farm product traceability system for ensuring safety of farm product.
sent.trans: 安全追溯体系建设对于保障农产品安全具有重要意义。

sent.orig: Trout Lake Farm is the largest organic herbal farm in North America.
sent.trans: 9?鱼湖农场是北美洲最大的有机草本农场。

sent.orig: But haven't etc, daley's farm out in a professor of manasseh will persuade to the farm.
sent.trans: 可还没等走出农场，多诺茜就在一位叫玛威尔教授的劝说下回到了农场。

sent.orig: Experts say clothing worn on the farm, shoes stay on the farm.
sent.trans: 专家称在农场穿过的衣物、鞋子要留在农场。
